Namespace Eighty.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures

Classes

EightyMvcViewOptionsSetup

Configures the MvcViewOptions to set up an EightyViewEngine.

EightyViewAdapter<TModel>

Wraps an IHtmlRenderer<TModel> into an IView.

EightyViewCollection

A collection of views.

EightyViewEngine

An IViewEngine which can render IHtmlRenderer<TModel>s and IHtmlBuilderRenderer<TModel>s.

EightyViewOptions

Options for the EightyViewEngine.

TwentyViewAdapter<TModel>

Wraps an IHtmlBuilderRenderer<TModel> into an IView.
